message: 1. I love your voice, its beautiful!
2. I love that you see the view from a different perspective to me (height-wise)
3. I love your instagram posts, plz give us more
4. I love how thoughtful and considerate you are of others
5. I love how you make me feel like I am never alone
6. I love how you are so genuine and authentic
7. I love how our conversations are like constant, never-ending chats
8. I love the stories you tell me about times in your life, I love to hear about you
9. I love how you always seem to shine, like a star gir
10. I love how you always prioritize your family and their well-being
11. I love your strength and resilience as the eldest daughter
12. I love that you have good taste in music
13. I love that our music taste stay matching in the 90 percent mark
14. I love the time when it was just us going back and forth posting songs in the music channel in the server so long ago
15. I love it when you play genji
16. I love how its always a good time when we link up
17. I love the inside jokes, they are neverending fr
18. I love that you hype me up all the time
19. I love that there is no element of competition in our friendship, just support!
20. I love that you understand me deeply
21. I love that you remind me of the ocean
22. I love all the thought you put into your gifts, I still love my birthday gift from last year
23. I love how talented you are!!
24. I love that you take care of your mum so well
25. I love that i can send you those parental issues tiktoks and you get it LOL
26. I love when i log into the GH tiktok and see you posted a new tiktok, theyre always so creative
27. I love hearing your voice in VC! Especially your laugh
28. I love thinking back to the times when we talked everyday, all day about everything in that og5 groupchat
29. I love it when you and cheesy carry me and mana in valorant
30. I love laughing together
31. I love to see your recent songs pop up in my spotify and seeing what youre listening to at that moment
32. I love how you are so understanding and empathetic
33. I love when you speak in your language! Its beautiful
34. I love the times we can just be haters together without fear of being judged
35. I love to read the notes you make for our meetings, they are always so good
36. I love that you are always there when I need you
37. I love that we can talk about pretty much anything under the sun
38. I love our little trio! Us fr fr (insert cat pic)
39. I love that you have been a real ride or die since the get go!
40. I love how you are so selfless and giving.
41. I love that we have like the exact same humor
42. I love that I can quote the stupidest memes and tiktoks, and you will just get it LOL
43. I love how you take time to reflect on things and then speak on it after good thought
44. I love that we both be disappearing when things get tough, then coming back - its lowk probs a bad habit but atleast we have it together LOL
45. I love that you are a gemini!
46. I love how you are so supportive and loving toward your friends
47. I love how your partner is so similar to mine and it makes me laugh sometimes
48. I love how there are some things that only you can understand
49. I love that we both share that eldest daughter debuff
50. I love that we can be toxic in game together (iykyk)
51. I love that you are a very freaky gyal
52. I love the moment we both realised we be on c.ai LOL
53. I love how i can say the most TMI shit, and it will never be TMI
54. I love your face, you are so beautiful FORREALLLL
55. I love your eye for graphic design, you are so talented my girl
56. I love that you are a ride or die friend, like if you jump then i jump type and i love it
57. I love that you never judge me for anything I do or say
58. I love all of the different crushes you have on anime men LMAO
59. I love that we both like that one ao3 tag that starts with c, ends with c and has an n in the middle LOL
60. I love that you are lowkey protective of your friends, or highkey haha
61. I love that we always be skipping straight to the deep convos, small talk is rare fr
62. I love how much time, effort and love youve put into our community
63. I love that we started this whole server with just 5 people and a dream!
64. I love how when someone says dont tell anyone it doesnt include the other person LOL
65. I love that you know me so well, and I know you so well!
66. I love that one memory of the trio playing roblox and me being left behind LMAO
67. I love how were always on that same page with pretty much everything
68. I love how we dont really fight or argue, and not for lack of tough times, but because we openly communicate as much as we can
69. I love that you are so spiritual, and believe in signs and destiny and the red string theory
70. I love that you care so much for your dogs!
71. I love that you work so hard during the day, and then come home and work hard there too and then even in the server
72. I love how you make friends and connections so easily with other people
73. I love your reactions you give, it always matches the energy
74. I love that we both used to be bishops favorite LOL
75. I love that you make an effort to stay calm and collected in the face of some truly irksome people
76. I love that you believe in intuition
77. I love how you once went around deleting videos off peoples phones of your friend losing that one fight LOL
78. I love how you made a best friend on twitter once and still hold them close, because it shows me we are similar in that way we hold people in our hearts
79. I love your sense of loyalty to those that you love and care for
80. I love that the song C U GIRL by Steve Lacy reminds me of you
81. I love it when we can just chill and watch movies together and with our friends
82. I love your messages you send when I'm going thru it and you never expect me to reply
83. I love the little friend group we have together
84. I love that we stay sending each other thirst traps on tiktok
85. I love that we also stay sending each other sad poems on tiktok LMAO
86. I love seeing you pop into the server and interacting with everyone
87. I love how easy our convos flow and then if we take a few business days to reply, thats also okay
88. I love that there is no pressure to be a certain way between us
89. I love talking to you about random ass things and spilling the tea when we get it
90. I love the thought of when we get to spend actual birthdays and christmases and easters together
91. I love that we all have each others backs when sending those stressful messages
92. I love that I am not alone with the poly feet curse
93. I love when we share the same pride of seeing Iam Tongi do well, we will always root for our people!
94. I love how you are an amazing daughter, because you are!
95. I love how you get it when I say I need three days to recover from time with certain family members
96. I love the meaning of your name, like you truly were born to shine
97. I love the fact that despite the barriers and distance and unlikeliness, we still found each other
98. I love that our boyfriends get along so well, and are pretty much in their own bro-mance
99. I love that because you are the star sister and i am the moon sister, we will always be side by side
100. I love you and everything you are, have been and will be! Happy Birthday my sister!
